people.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
people.description: Franklin Delano Roosevelt , commonly known as FDR, was an American statesman and political leader who served as the 32nd President of the United States, from 1933 to 1945.

people.name: Langston Hughes
people.description: James Mercer Langston Hughes  was an American poet, social activist, novelist, playwright, and columnist from Joplin, Missouri.

people.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick
people.description: Harry Emerson Fosdick  was an American pastor.  Fosdick became a central figure in the "Fundamentalist-Modernist Controversy" within American Protestantism in the 1920s and 1930s and was one of the most prominent liberal ministers of the early 20th Century.

people.name: Walther Bothe
people.description: Walther Wilhelm Georg Bothe  was a German nuclear physicist, who shared the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1954 with Max Born.

people.name: Max von Laue
people.description: Max Theodor Felix von Laue  was a German physicist who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1914 for his discovery of the diffraction of X-rays by crystals.

people.name: Sean M. Carroll
people.description: Sean Michael Carroll  is a cosmologist and Physics professor specializing in dark energy and general relativity.

people.name: Lise Meitner
people.description: Lise Meitner  was an Austrian physicist who worked on radioactivity and nuclear physics.

items.name: The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta
items.description: It is a photograph about The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta. In a corner, it says:The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta is a science book for the lay reader, by Albert Einstein and Leopold Infeld, tracing the development of ideas in physics.   There are things written behind: Physics The Feynman Lectures on Physics Albert Einstein  And the following place: Switzerland

items.name: Physics

The following people are mentioned:  Leo Szilard Max Planck Lise Meitner   And the following places: Germany and Switzerland
